segments.text: I'm sorry , but I'm afraid you've dialed the wrong number.There is no Stefan here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Are you sure ? I called before and he was there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I'm sure . You have the wrong number . I have used this number for more than 20 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That can't be true . I remember the number clearly . Is your number 1199886 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn't . It's 1199866 . It seems that you have misdialed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry I bothered you . I'm really sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . It happens to everyone .
segments.speaker: S1
